fields.name: DefaultGroup
fields.description: The default owner group for all new folders and files created in the Data Lake Store account.

fields.name: EncryptionState
fields.description: The current state of encryption for this Data Lake Store account.

fields.name: FirewallAllowAzureIPs
fields.description: The current state of allowing or disallowing IPs originating within Azure through the firewall. If the firewall is disabled, this is not enforced.

fields.name: FirewallRules
fields.description: The list of firewall rules associated with this Data Lake Store account.

fields.name: FirewallState
fields.description: The current state of the IP address firewall for this Data Lake Store account.

fields.name: NewTier
fields.description: The commitment tier to use for next month.

fields.name: TrustedIdProviderState
fields.description: The current state of the trusted identity provider feature for this Data Lake Store account.

fields.name: TrustedIdProviders
fields.description: The list of trusted identity providers associated with this Data Lake Store account.

fields.name: VirtualNetworkRules
fields.description: The list of virtual network rules associated with this Data Lake Store account.
